original: @281b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @281b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya t'a r'a sto tram bhi sa karm'a s'a dha n'a ma /
analyzed: a'arya t'a r'a sto tram bhi sa karm'a s'a dha n'a ma /
translated: Aryatārāsthotrabhisakarma-sādhanā-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa phrin las sgrub pa zhes bya ba //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa phrin las sgrub pa zhes bya ba //
translated: The Praise of Noble Tārā Called Accomplishing Activities

original: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Bhagavatī Tārā!

original: t'am yig ljang gu autpal las byung ba'i //
analyzed: t'am yig ljang gu autpal las byung ba'i //
translated: From an utpala born from the syllable tāṃ, green

original: sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
analyzed: sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
translated: Is Tārā, green, with one face and two arms.

original: phyag gnyis sku la rin chen sna tshogs spras //
analyzed: phyag gnyis sku la rin chen sna tshogs spras //
translated: Her two arms are adorned with various jewels on her body.

original: yid dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: yid dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the deity Tārā, the meditation deity.

original: don grub la sogs rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing //
analyzed: don grub la sogs rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing //
translated: Her head is adorned with the five families, such as Amoghasiddhi,

original: bcu drug lo lon 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang ldan //
analyzed: bcu drug lo lon 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang ldan //
translated: and she has the face of a sixteen-year-old maiden.

original: gzi brjid bzod dka' sna tshogs lhag par 'dud //
analyzed: gzi brjid bzod dka' sna tshogs lhag par 'dud //
translated: She is difficult to bear with her splendor, and various [deities] bow down.

original: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the deity Tārā, the meditation deity.

original: phyag g-yas mchog sbyin phyag g-yon autpal 'dzin //
analyzed: phyag g-yas mchog sbyin phyag g-yon autpal 'dzin //
translated: Her right hand is in the boon-granting gesture, her left hand holds an utpala,
and on the utpala🔽is a book.

original: tshogs padma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: tshogs padma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: She is on a variegated lotus and moon disc.

original: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum tshul gyis rab tu bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum tshul gyis rab tu bzhugs //
translated: Standing with right leg extended and left drawn in.

original: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the deity of the pledged deity Tārā.

original: thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la rtag tu gzigs //
analyzed: thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la rtag tu gzigs //
translated: Always looking upon beings with eyes of compassion,

original: sku la 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sgrol ma 'phro //
analyzed: sku la 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sgrol ma 'phro //
translated: From your body emanates Tārā, who protects from the eight fears.

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun las sgrol byed pa'i //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun las sgrol byed pa'i //
translated: You who liberate from all the sufferings of saṃsāra,

original: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the deity of the pledged deity Tārā.

original: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dang // las tshogs thams cad myur du grub mdzad ma //
analyzed: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dang // las tshogs thams cad myur du grub mdzad ma //
translated: You who swiftly accomplish all activities—pacifying, increasing, controlling, and fierce—

original: phrin las thams cad yongs su grub byed pa'i //
analyzed: phrin las thams cad yongs su grub byed pa'i //
translated: You who completely accomplish all activities,

original: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the deity of the pledged deity Tārā.🔽Lion, elephant, fire, snake, thief,

original: seng ge glang chen me sbrul chom rkun dang ; / lcags sgrog chu dang bgegs dang 'jigs pa brgyad //
analyzed: seng ge glang chen me sbrul chom rkun dang ; / lcags sgrog chu dang bgegs dang 'jigs pa brgyad //
translated: iron chain, water, and obstacles—the eight fears—

original: 'jigs pa kun las yongs su sgrol byed pa'i //
analyzed: 'jigs pa kun las yongs su sgrol byed pa'i //
translated: You who completely liberate from all fears,

original: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the deity of the pledged deity Tārā.

original: gdon dang rims dang smyo 'bog la sogs dang // gnod byed la sogs dus min 'chi bas skrag / sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi byed pa'i //
analyzed: gdon dang rims dang smyo 'bog la sogs dang // gnod byed la sogs dus min 'chi bas skrag / sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi byed pa'i //
translated: of all harm-doers, and of all suffering.

original: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and offer praise to the sublime deity, the yidam Tara,

original: skye bo sngon bsags las dang nyon mongs kyi //
analyzed: skye bo sngon bsags las dang nyon mongs kyi //
translated: who completely pacifies all suffering.🔽Whatever negative actions I have accumulated

original: mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu sogs sdig / sdig pa'i las rnams bdag gis ci bsags pa //
analyzed: mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu sogs sdig / sdig pa'i las rnams bdag gis ci bsags pa //
translated: through the five heinous acts, the ten nonvirtues, and so on,🔽the result of my previous karma and afflictions,🔽may all of them be purified without exception.

original: de dag thams cad ma lus byang bar shog / bdag ni da ltar skye ba 'di la yang //
analyzed: de dag thams cad ma lus byang bar shog / bdag ni da ltar skye ba 'di la yang //
translated: In this very life, may all inauspiciousness

original: mi ngan mtshan ngan 'chi ltas dus min skrag / bkra mi shis pa thams cad dag gyur nas //🔽tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod rgyas par shog / bdag ni ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du //
analyzed: mi ngan mtshan ngan 'chi ltas dus min skrag / bkra mi shis pa thams cad dag gyur nas // tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod rgyas par shog / bdag ni ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du //
translated: and all untimely death omens of evil and misfortune be pacified,🔽and may my lifespan, merit, and enjoyments increase.

original: yi dam sgrol ma rjes su dran gyur nas //
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma rjes su dran gyur nas //
translated: In all my future lives, may I remember the yidam Tara,

original: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub la sogs pa //
analyzed: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub la sogs pa //
translated: and may I attain the supreme and common siddhis🔽and all that I wish for.

original: las tshogs thams cad yid bzhin grub par shog / yi dam sgrol ma thugs rje che ldan pa //
analyzed: las tshogs thams cad yid bzhin grub par shog / yi dam sgrol ma thugs rje che ldan pa //
translated: May all my actions be accomplished as I wish.

original: bdag gis rab tu brtse ba'i gdung sems kyis //
analyzed: bdag gis rab tu brtse ba'i gdung sems kyis //
translated: I have praised you, Tārā, with a mind of great love.

original: bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang bsags des //
analyzed: bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang bsags des //
translated: By the merit I have thus accumulated,🔽may I never be separated from you, my chosen deity.

original: yi dam sgrol ma lha dang mi 'bral shog /'phags ma sgrol ba'i bstod pa phrin las thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: yi dam sgrol ma lha dang mi 'bral shog /'phags ma sgrol ba'i bstod pa phrin las thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba /
translated: This praise of Noble Tārā, called “Accomplishing All Activities,”

original: slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: was composed by the master Candragomin. It is complete.
